name: Switch_Button-1_0
title: Switch Button by GalactusX31 updated for 1.0
author: GalactusX31
description:
This mod adds on/off switch button for sending a single signal.
It also allows to change the way it works in mod settings, to either toggle On/Off state by left-click and access inventory via mod hotkey, or to work like a regular constant combinator.
